text: hi guys mr. Oliver here I just wanted to
say a massive happy Christmas and happy
New Year to all of the forum users and
people that use jamieoliver.com
we've been going for about 15 years now
I know since we did the site you know
properly nine years ago some of you guys
are still coming back to us time and
time again you're taking stuff you're
using stuff and you're sharing your own
sort of trials and tribulations and
experiences and I really really
appreciate all of you use in the forum's
so thank you thank you very much we do
appreciate it the site's getting busier
and busier and next year we're going to
be doing even more changes to make it
even better than it already is
so thank you very much have a great
Christmas take care lots of love mr. oak
